Cell Data Operators

A variety of operators are provided to coarsen and refine cell-centered patch data on a Cartesian mesh. These operators are representative of the spatial coarsen and refine operators found in the library for all other array-based types.
  • SAMRAI::geom::CartesianCellComplexWeightedAverage
  • SAMRAI::geom::CartesianCellDoubleConservativeLinearRefine
